extDescription.message: Web scraping tool with customizable selectors. Extract data from web pages and export to CSV, JSON, or Excel formats.

addField.description: Button text to add a new field

parseData.description: Button text to start parsing data

baseSelectorPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for base selector input

fieldNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for field name input

removeField.description: Button text to remove a field

errorNoElements.message: No elements found with the base selector
errorNoElements.description: Error message when no elements are found

errorAccessPage.message: Error: Cannot access page. Please refresh the page and try again.
errorAccessPage.description: Error message when page cannot be accessed

errorBaseSelector.description: Error message when base selector is missing

errorMissingSelectors.message: Please enter base selector and at least one field
errorMissingSelectors.description: Error message when selectors are missing

statsFound.description: Stats message showing number of items found
